price: Kandi (Ababangikanyamana) baravuze bati “(Allah) Nyirimpuhwe afite umwana. Ubutagatifu ni ubwe (ntibibaho ko yagira umwana)! Ahubwo (abo bamalayika bita abana be) ni abagaragu bubashywe.”
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۚ بَلۡ عِبَادٞ مُّكۡرَمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqālū ittakhadha al-raḥmānu waladan sub'ḥānahu bal ʿibādun muk'ramūna
